tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE retirement_projections (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR,
  age INT,
  retirement_age INT,
  current_savings DECIMAL,
  retirement_goal DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE retirement_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  savings DECIMAL,
  retirement_age INT,
  primary_goal VARCHAR,
  lifestyle_goal VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE projections (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  current_age INT,
  life_expectancy INT,
  projected_income DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    retirement_age INT,
    desired_retirement_income DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE savings (
    savings_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    current_savings DECIMAL,
    monthly_contribution DECIMAL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_user_id FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE lifestyle_goals (
    goal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    travel_budget DECIMAL,
    health_care_budget DECIMAL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_user_id FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE retirement_savings (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  current_savings DECIMAL,
  retirement_age INT,
  annual_contribution DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE lifestyle_goals (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  desired_monthly_income DECIMAL,
  retirement_age INT,
  health_care_expenses DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE projections (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  projected_monthly_income DECIMAL,
  projected_life_expectancy INT,
  confidence_level DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE users (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR,
  email VARCHAR,
  age INT,
  occupation VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE users (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR NOT NULL,
age INT,
savings DECIMAL)

CREATE TABLE income_sources (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
user_id INT,
source_name VARCHAR,
amount DECIMAL)

CREATE TABLE expenses (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
user_id INT,
expense_name VARCHAR,
amount DECIMAL)

CREATE TABLE goals (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
user_id INT,
goal_name VARCHAR,
target_amount DECIMAL)

CREATE TABLE projections (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
user_id INT,
year INT,
projected_income DECIMAL,
projected_expenses DECIMAL,
projected_savings DECIMAL)
